description: South Sea pearl necklace with 16mm pearls

core:description.text: An opulent strand of luminous South Sea pearls, each generous 16mm orb radiating soft iridescence. The necklace nestles against the collarbone with a gentle weight that speaks to its rarity, finished with a discreet clasp that keeps the focus on the pearls themselves. A statement piece destined for gala entrances and heirloom moments.
